name: Joined Together
description:
This game was created in 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2021.

I struggled to come up with a good idea to begin with, and raced to get this idea finished towards the end. As a result, I had to cut some features like harder enemies and power-ups. It is what it is!

The visual style was inspired by MSX games Pleasure Hearts and Knightmare.
